freemarker.template

类 SimpleNumber

  • java.lang.Object
    • freemarker.template.SimpleNumber
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TemplateModel, TemplateNumberModel, Serializable

    public final class SimpleNumber
extends Object
implements TemplateNumberModel, Serializable
    A simple implementation of the TemplateNumberModel interface. Note that this class is immutable.

    This class is thread-safe.

      • getAsNumber

        public Number getAsNumber()
        从接口复制的说明: TemplateNumberModel
        Returns the numeric value. The return value must not be null.
        指定者:
        getAsNumber 在接口中 TemplateNumberModel
        返回:
        the Number instance associated with this number model.
